special_dishes.name: Apple & Banana Crumble
special_dishes.description: Warm apple and banana crumble, perfect for a winter dessert.

special_dishes.name: Cucumber & Tomato Salad with Okra Fritters
special_dishes.description: Refreshing salad with crispy okra fritters, a light and flavorful option.

special_dishes.name: Orange & Okra Stir Fry
special_dishes.description: A sweet and savory stir fry that combines the zest of oranges with the unique texture of okra. Served with potatoes.

special_dishes.name: Spiced Patato & Tomato Soup
special_dishes.description: A comforting and hearty soup, perfect for a cold January day.

normal_dishes.name: Classic Patato Fries
normal_dishes.description: Golden and crispy patato fries, a timeless favorite.

normal_dishes.name: Tomato & Cucumber Sandwich
normal_dishes.description: A simple yet satisfying sandwich with fresh tomato and cucumber.

new_dishes.name: Banana & Patato Mash with Orange Zest
new_dishes.description: A creamy and flavorful mash with a hint of citrus.

new_dishes.name: Apple, Cucumber & Okra Relish
new_dishes.description: A tangy and refreshing relish, perfect as a side or topping.
